alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northeastern Nye County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 10:13AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...ELEVATED FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS FOR THE 4TH OF JULY... Warm and very dry conditions continue today. Another round of gusty winds expected this afternoon and evening, especially across east-central Nevada. The winds, in combination with the warm and dry weather, will result in elevated fire weather conditions through this evening. A Red Flag Warning remains in effect for White Pine and northeast Nye counties until 8PM PDT as critical fire weather conditions are expected. Please practice fire weather safety if out recreating or lighting fireworks. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
